message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $160. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $140. This product is of exceptional value, and I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $120 is the highest I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $120?
